actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of Kuan Sheng Fong a/k/a Pete K. S. Fong; and Shyr Yuh-Yu Fong a/k/a Nancy Fong, his wife; and Shyr Yuh Shuen Wei Fong, a/k/a Sylvia Fong, his daughter, and I. Chun Fong, a/k/a Victor Fong, his son.

summary.text: Declares four individuals lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence, under the Immigration and Nationality Act.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Kuan Sheng Fong a/k/a Pete K. S. Fong; and Shyr Yuh-Yu Fong a/k/a Nancy Fong, his wife; and Shyr Yuh Shuen Wei Fong, a/k/a Sylvia Fong, his daughter, and I. Chun Fong, a/k/a Victor Fong, his son.
